ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    java.setContent(ml)
    var txt = java.getString("#txt>p@text");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if(/验证码/.test(result)){java.toast('请重新登录')}
else if(/更换搜索词试试/.test(result)){java.toast('请更换搜索词')}
result</js>
.index_body.0@a

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
let chapters = document.select(".book-chapter a");
let chapterData = [];
let invalidChapterFound = false;

chapters.forEach((item) => {
    let title = item.text();
    let href = item.attr("href");
    let chapterNumberMatch = title.match(/第(\d+)章/);

    if (!chapterNumberMatch) {
        // 检测到无效章节，标记为不合法
        invalidChapterFound = true;
    } else {
        let chapterNumber = parseInt(chapterNumberMatch[1], 10);
        chapterData.push({
            number: chapterNumber,
            text: title,
            href: href
        });
     }
});

if (book.getVariable("custom")!=""&&invalidChapterFound==false) {
	   java.toast("目录乱序修复已开启")
    chapterData.sort((a, b) => a.number - b.number);
} else {
    chapterData = []
    chapters.forEach((item) => (chapterData.push({
        text: item.text(),
        href: item.attr("href")
    })));
}
chapterData
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    java.setContent(ml)
    var txt = java.getString(".word_read>p@text");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
match=result.match(/d\(".+"[^"]+".+"\)/)
function d(a, b){
	b = java.md5Encode(b)
	iv = b.substring(0, 16)
	key = b.substring(16)
	Cipher=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding" ,key,iv)
	return Cipher.decryptStr(a)}
eval(match[0])
</js>
p@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
temp=result
R=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(temp).select(".BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a")
c=[]
R.forEach(r=>{
	i=String(r.attr('href')).replace(/.+\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/,`$1`)
	//java.log(i)
	c.push({
		name:r.text(),
		url:r.attr('href'),
		index:i
		})
	})
try{
	o=temp.match(/originalOrder[^=]*=[^\[]*\[([^\]]+)\]/)[1]
	o=o.split(",")
	c.sort((a,b)=>o[c.indexOf(a)]-o[c.indexOf(b)])
	}catch (err){
		java.log(err)
		c.sort((a,b)=>a.index-b.index)
		}
	result=c
</js>
